short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The game follows the story about and Watergirl that are abandoned in the forest temple and need to find the fastest path levels.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fireboy and Watergirl 1 Forest Temple game is available in the chrome web store just install it and play Fireboy and Watergirl 1 Forest Temple game.

Fireboy and Watergirl 1: Forest Temple is best played cooperatively with one other player. You and a friend control both characters separately. Using these characters, you must defeat a range of traps and tricky situations, pick up gems, and reach the end of the level.

Controls:-
                        
                                   Fireboy Controls
                                   Left and right arrow keys = move
                                   Up arrow key = jump


Watergirl Controls:-
                                     
                                     AD = move
                                     Up arrow key = jump
